channel.title: Blog - Conor Barnes
channel.description: Conor Barnes's home page and blog.

item.title: let's go 2020 woooo
item.description: This year sucked! However, I was lucky to spend most of it learning.

item.title: 100 Tips For A Better Life
item.description: The other day I made an advice thread based on Putanumonit's from last year!

item.title: 40 Programming Questions / 6 Months In
item.description: I started teaching myself to program about six months ago.

item.title: Pregnancy? Experts Divided.
item.description: In confronting the problem of mortality and the falling human population, a radical solution has been floated: Allow women to deliberately become pregnant and give birth.

item.title: Poetry With Heart
item.description: Do we like bad writing? Does it have heart?

item.title: The Virtues of Melee
item.description: Two weeks ago, improvements to the netcode for Super Smash Bros Melee (Melee) dramatically expanded the potential for online play.

item.title: Second-Order Existential Risk
item.description: How important is creating the conditions to fix existential risks versus actually fixing existential risks?

item.title: Three Ways to Think Less Stupidly About Groups
item.description: On simple ways to think better about groups.

item.title: The Values of Others
item.description: It seems like common-sense to appeal to the values of others, in a Dale Carnegie way. Show people why they should agree with you! People don’t care about your values, they want you to appeal to theirs!
